Params: {3: 'No matter what sorrows tomorrow may bring.'}
{3: 'No matter what grief tomorrow may bring.'}
{3: 'I am certain that, as long as we are together...'}
{3: 'That this long, endless night will eventually pass.'}
{3: 'Miracles will surely bloom with the dawn.'}
{3: 'I am Lucia, born because of you. (Switch BGM at the climax)'}
{3: 'As long as you remain by my side...'}
{3: 'Whatever the future holds, I fear nothing.'}
